short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Z-table lookup: Find the percentage of values below a given z-score in a standard normal distribution.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tool to quickly calculate probabilities in a normal distribution from a z-score table. 

You can either use the slider or enter a z-score value in the input field to find, among other things, the percentage of values below or above this value in a standard normal distribution.

You can also: 
- Compute probabilities between two z-scores.
- Calculate a z-score by entering a test value, a mean value and a standard deviation.
- Read and understand how to use a positive and negative z-table.
